body_html:
additionally, this GAN example is not setting a fixed random seed. So on each different machine it's possible that the GAN (which is quite unstable) is not converging because of the seed.

Try setting torch.manual_seed(1) at the top of the script and see if that helps reproducibility
body_text:
additionally, this GAN example is not setting a fixed random seed. So on each different machine it's possible that the GAN (which is quite unstable) is not converging because of the seed.
Try setting torch.manual_seed(1) at the top of the script and see if that helps reproducibility
body:
additionally, this GAN example is not setting a fixed random seed. So on each different machine it's possible that the GAN (which is quite unstable) is not converging because of the seed.

Try setting `torch.manual_seed(1)` at the top of the script and see if that helps reproducibility
